reflectChance.description: Each point of value provides a 1% chance to reflect any item used on you back to the user.

treasureLuck.description: Each point of value provides a 1% chance to double edbucks gained on clicking the Pickup Edbucks button.

vocalLuck.description: Each point of value provides a 1% chance to gain 1 extra edbuck when awarded for being in an active VC.

reactionBonus.description: Each point of value provides 1 extra edbuck when receiving a valid edbuck reaction.

usableCrit.description: Each point of value provides a 1% chance to land a critical use when using items that have a critical effect.

usablesDiscount.description: Each point of value provides a 1% discount when buying items from the usables shop.
